name: IPEVO
overview:
IPEVO is the online source for innovative and well-designed products that enhance the experience of how you use your computers, smart-phones and the Internet.

From the Skype phone to the Point 2 View document cam and the bluetooth wireless speaker Tubular, IPEVO keeps working on the products to fit customers’ need.

For example, the Point 2 View document comes with a multi-joint stand, 2 megapixel CMOS sensor, has been popular among teachers who use it to replace the current expensive document because of it’s portability and reasonable price. IPEVO does offer a better solution for schools especially when the school budge has been cut.

Point 2 View document is also a great tool for presenters. It is useful when demoing the objects to the audiences or demo the application on iPhone or iPad.

Talking about iPad. IPEVO bluetooth wireless speaker Tubular also a great choice for iPad and iPhone users to enjoy the music without the hassel of the wire.

For more product information, please go to www.ipevo.com
